response.overview: After the four masters and disciples retrieved the true scriptures, because they had all become Buddhas and immortals, they lived forever. After hundreds of years, they had their own lives in today's era. Unexpectedly, the Buddha's magic weapon moonlight treasure box was stolen by the white bone spirit. The Buddha ordered the Tang monk to recall several apprentices. After many hard work, they took back the treasure box and completed the Buddha's task.
response.title: Magical Journey to the West
